Contributor: Godwin, Frank, 1889- artist.; Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "Frank Godwin." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text encourages people to buy bonds because the immediate war bills must be paid or the war machine will collapse and there will be a penalty. Illustration shows a scale with men putting coins on one side and a woman being attacked on the other side. The poster appears to be a design for an advertisement.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Liberty bonds -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; Advertising, Political -- United States.;

Title: Pay the bill or pay the penalty!
Source: From: Pay the bill or pay the penalty!
